org.apache.storm

Class LocalDRPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.LocalDRPC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Shutdownable, DistributedRPC.Iface, DistributedRPCInvocations.Iface, ILocalDRPC

    public class LocalDRPC
extends Object
implements ILocalDRPC

    A Local way to test DRPC

    try (LocalDRPC drpc = new LocalDRPC()) { // Do tests }

        public String getServiceId()
        Description copied from interface: ILocalDRPC

        Get the ID of the service. This is used internally if multiple local DRPC clusters are in use at one time.
